title: Bug 17703 - Edit/Add Task action should use Workbench dialog as Java Editor does
OB: When selecting a Compilation Unit (CU) in the packages view and executing the 'File > Add Task' action (F1), the observed behavior is that a different dialog appears compared to executing the same action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
EB: The expected behavior is that the 'Edit/Add Task' action, when triggered from the packages view, should use the same dialog as the one used when executing the action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Navigate to the packages view. 2. Select a Compilation Unit (CU). 3. Execute the 'File > Add Task' action (F1). Compare the observed dialog with the one obtained by executing the same action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
